title: Gholamabad, Ilam
text: Gholamabad (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Gholāmābād) is a village in <a href="Zarrin%20Dasht%20Rural%20District">Zarrin Dasht Rural District</a>, in the <a href="Central%20District%20%28Darreh%20Shahr%20County%29">Central District</a> of <a href="Darreh%20Shahr%20County">Darreh Shahr County</a>, <a href="Ilam%20Province">Ilam Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 165, in 27 families. The village is populated by <a href="Kurds">Kurds</a>.
